abstract: Bank of America said it would resume foreclosures on 16,000 homes, after suspending them because of the robo-signing scandal.
snippet: Bank of America said it would resume foreclosures on 16,000 homes, after suspending them because of the robo-signing scandal.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America said on Thursday that it would restart foreclosures on 16,000 properties this month, after suspending them in October because of the robo-signing scandal.

headline.main: Bank of America to Restart 16,000 Foreclosures
